Evarin
Thursday, November 9th, 2017, 6:25:42 PM

Quote from GM Retser via The Officials:

Hey Everyone, you can now claim your Goodies by using the GIFTBOX verb.

giftbox

Usage: GIFTBOX {OPTION}

Options: SIMUCON17 - Claims your Simucon Giftbag if unclaimed from 2017 (1/2).

There are still more accounts to be added to the list. If you use the command and your account is missing, it will instruct you to e-mail Sleken.

If you already have e-mailed him please be patient.

I posted this in the Gemstone area so that it gets main paged. Please continue the discussion under the previous topic under SIMUCON outside of GEMSTONE IV.

http://forums.play.net/forums/SimuCon/SimuCon%20'17/General%20Discussions/view

Retser, ASGM

This message was originally posted in Socializing, SimuCon. To discuss the above, follow the link below.

http://forums.play.net/forums/19/219/3183/view/134

@briarfox from the campaign reward description:

Goodie Bag

Receive a virtual goodie bag of in-game items to commemorate the event. Items include an in-game title unique to SimuCon 2017 attendees, a special SimuCon 2017 scripted item, a level 4 RPA, and GemStone IV players will receive a feature token, a customization token and an enhancive token for the Summit Academy! DragonRealms perks TBD.

so imho they were clear about that when asking for contributions., butI do think it would have been prudent to reiterate this on delivery.

Evarin
Friday, November 10th, 2017, 12:23:51 AM

Official E-mail:

Thank you again to everyone who contributed to this campaign, and most especially thank you for your patience. The Goodie Bags have been distributed in GemStone IV, and can be claimed with the GIFTBOX command. If you cannot claim the giftbox, and know you should have one, please send an e-mail to GS4-SLEKEN@play.net, and be sure to include your account name AND the e-mail address you used when contributing through Indiegogo. Additionally, I know some of you still have not received or claimed your auction wins. If you're still pending on that, please e-mail GS4-ZYTHICA@play.net for assistance.

Thank you again!

--GM Zythica

Riend
Friday, November 10th, 2017, 11:47:37 AM

PERHAPS.... a compromise would be creating an "official" channel for the discord and cross-post from that. At least that way it will be more widely read (because not everyone reads every chat they've missed when they go back to discord) and if it's seen as something extremely important it could be cross-posted here?

I know there was a bit of confusion of EG where things were said in the discord but never in any other official capacity so it was left up to speculation and conjecture. While I am a huge fan of having as much transparency as possible, we can certainly find better ways of disseminating the information coming out of discord so it reaches the community as a whole without being significantly altered.

Estild
Friday, November 10th, 2017, 12:15:57 PM

@Evarin and @Alastir are exactly correct about this situation. What I posted wasn't any official announcement (however factual it may be). I saw someone ask about it on Discord and because I knew the answer, I responded. I was not involved with organizing SimuCon or handling goodie bags this year, so anything I offer up is purely because I'm trying to help and it's not my place to make official announcements regarding it. If other players want to post on the forums to ask the same questions, they certainly can, then Sleken or Zythica can respond on it. Even without that, everyone would have learned about what I stated at the time when the titles and second giftbox are available, because those clearly would have been announced.

I'm not going to cross-post everything I state in Discord, because as noted, it is a conversation. And even if Wyrom told me it was required, that's just going to mean I'm not going to communicate on Discord. Just the same, I don't expect every conversation I have with every player at SimuCon to be documented.

Believe me when I say I am one of the most appreciative persons of your work, @allereli. I realize this post probably isn't the response you're looking for, but please take it in stride and reevaluate the situation based upon what's stated above.
